definitions.definition: A person considered alone, rather than as belonging to a group of people.
A single physical human being as a legal subject, as opposed to a legal person such as a corporation.
An object, be it a thing or an agent, as contrasted to a class.
An element belonging to a population.
Relating to a single person or thing as opposed to more than one.
definitions.example: As we can't print them all together, the individual pages will have to be printed one by one.

definitions.definition: Intended for a single person as opposed to more than one person.
definitions.example: individual personal pension; individual cream cakes

definitions.definition: Not divisible without losing its identity.
